    excerpt: "Farmers are being called on to help train robots to spot slugs and the damage they cause to arable crops. The ground-breaking trial, set to start in the spring, will equip the ‘Slug Sleuths’ with special rigs designed to improve the complex machine-learning algorithms used to identify the slimy pests."
